DOC.brief_summary: The goal propose study test capability CareTaker monitor extract respiration signature acquire signal , determine respiration rate breaths/minute meet exceed performance level predicate device .
DOC.detailed_description: The goal propose study test capability CareTaker monitor extract respiration signature acquire signal , determine respiration rate breaths/minute meet exceed performance level predicate device . The detection approach RSPR ( respiratory rate ) CareTaker technology take base peak detection pulse analysis arterial pressure pulse signal , well spectral analysis raw CareTaker sensor signal . The study perform supervision Chesapeake IRB involve 21 subject > 18 monitor spontaneous metronome-paced breathing .
DOC.criteria: > 18 year age , able willing participate give verbal assent Unable give write consent < 18 year age No poor finger pulse , determine visual inspection ischemic hand
